title: Does Grammarly offer family plans?
content:
While we do not offer a dedicated family plan, you can create an account for your family by upgrading to Grammarly Pro. With the Pro plan, you can add your family members to the same subscription at an extra cost, allowing you to manage your billing in one place. You can learn more at
www.grammarly.com/plans
.
If you already have a Grammarly Pro subscription, you can invite your family members by following these steps:
Go to the
Members
page and click
Invite members
in the upper-right corner.
Next, enter your family membersâ€™ email addresses and click
Invite members
.
To join your subscription, those whom you invited need to click the link in the invitation sent to their email addresses.
Note:
The charge amount for additional members is prorated based on the number of days remaining in the current subscription period.
